name: Dioecesis
description:
This is my submission for  GDevelop Game Jam #1. Created in 9 days (I decided to change the theme of the game on the second day of the jam). Quite a lot of work in Gdevelop5 and Gimp this week... All sprites were created using the British Library Public domain Collections except for a bucket - which was downloaded from here - https://antiqueimages.blogspot.com/. Many ideas left unfinished but I managed to finish basic game mechanics... 

Controls:  Mouse/Touch controls, press R to restart

  • I recommend you playing the game in full screen
  • Bugs: probably many....
  • Is game mobile friendly? It is possible, but there are some issues, had no time to test it...

Thank you for playing! Have fun!
